 <Dev2heightDropdown></Dev2heightDropdown>
 <Dev2customScriptDD>
 <script>
$(document).ready(function(){
	try{
		var database = $.parseJSON('[[Dev2SourceManagementDatabase]]');
		var data = database.Types.split(",");
		$("#Dev2SourceManagementDatabaseType").html('');
		$(data).each(function(index,element){
			$("#Dev2SourceManagementDatabaseType").append("<option>"+element+"</option>");
		});
	}catch(e){
		//alert(e);
	}
});
</script>
 </Dev2customScriptDD>
